snippet: An official at a Worcester funeral home said Tamerlan  Tsarnaev’s body was moved late Wednesday night and entombed outside Massachusetts.
lead_paragraph: An official at a Worcester funeral home said Tamerlan  Tsarnaev’s body was moved late Wednesday night and entombed outside Massachusetts.

headline.seo: Body of Tamerlan Tsarnaev Is Interred in Undisclosed Location
headline.main: Bombing Suspect’s Body Interred in Undisclosed Location
